trends: There have been no other sightings in Granite
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Test ONLY for Oklahoma - Regarding SBCs email rest
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is only a test, not a real reporting. SBCYahoo has now imposed restrictionson email it receives for its customers. It isnt allowing the WUFOD reports to besent due to the reports being sent from a pop3 email server on a dynamic ipaddress. most email servers use a static ip address This is a test to see ifchanges made allow the report to come threw now. This test was conducted byLouis Inks, Ast State Director and Chief Investigator for the Oklahoma Chapterof MUFON Int under advisement of Don Weatherby, WUFOD Administrator.End of test. No action is require by HQ, unless this report doesnt make it backto the Oklahoma MUFON Officers. Susan Hill, SD and myself are now using SBCYahoofor internet service and it is critical that we receive the sighting reportsfrom WUFOD so we may do our job. Thanks
